scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build:tests
scripts.build:tests: babel tests/ --out-dir compiled_tests/ && rimraf compiled_tests/helpers && ncp tests/helpers compiled_tests/helpers && node scripts/createSpecialDirectory.js
